Title: Sr Sales Operations Analyst
Description:
What's the role?
HERE Global Sales Operations team is seeking a Salesforce Administrator to add value to our Customer Organization by automating complex business processes, creating reports & dashboards, and supporting and training HERE users on using Salesforce.

MAIN RESPONSIBILITIES

Manage Salesforce.com CRM including support requests and escalated administrative needs of users by providing prompt and complete resolution to technical challenges and business support issues.
Hands on configuration of all new and existing Salesforce.com features including user management, roles/profiles, Permission Sets, custom objects, new page layouts, custom fields, formula fields, validations, workflows rules, email templates, Process Builder, Flows, Lightning Pages, Custom Metadata Types, Custom Settings, Managed Packages.
Focus on user efficiencies, solving business/customer issues, invent creative solutions, and ensure data accuracy across the Salesforce system.
Partner with global business stakeholders to proactively identify, drive, and build improvements, enhancements, and system customizations that solve HERE Technologies Business needs.
Understanding customer, internal sales and account management team needs and translating them into robust business requirements for configuration and development in Salesforce CRM
Roadmap development and prioritization in partnership with the Sales Systems team and business stakeholders
Participate in change management process. Drive communication efforts across relevant stakeholders.
Develop and train local and global admin resources.
Who are you?
Basic Requirements:
Bachelor’s Degree
3+ years Salesforce.com Admin experience and configuration of 300+ users
Certified Salesforce.com Salesforce Administrator (ADM-201) or other equivalent qualification
Experience using Salesforce data tools (Data Loader, DemandTools, Workbench)
Experience with Lightning Reports and Dashboards creation, Process Automation, Security configuration.
Solid understanding of and detailed experience working with enterprise level Salesforce.com instance.
In-depth understanding of the capabilities and constraints of the Salesforce.com CRM application coupled with good understanding of standard business processes (Sales, Marketing, Operations, etc.)
Strong business analysis and functional understanding, including requirements gathering, creating/deploying solutions to end users.
Excellent verbal/written communication skills, including an ability to effectively communicate with both business and technical teams. Ability to handle competing priorities in a fast paced, deadline driven environment

Preferred Requirements
Certified Salesforce.com Administrator, Sales Cloud Consultant, or equivalent experience
Certified Salesforce.com Platform App Builder
Understanding of Apex/Visualforce
Experience in Process Automation, Security configuration, Data Model creation and Force.com Sites, Single Sign On.
Understanding of Steelbrick/salesforce CPQ is a plus.
Experience of Salesforce Community Cloud is a plus.
Highly organized, detail oriented, and ability to work independently
Experience working in iterative projects, and with deployment strategies/processes (staging environment vs. production)
Strong understanding of Agile based development practices and Sprint planning strategies. Project management and/or business process management certification or equivalent experience
Experience working with global teams

You can find us everywhere: in vehicles, smartphones, drones or third-party apps. We believe that with the right people, we will continue to be a game-changer in the technology industry and improve the daily lives of people around the world. Title: Analyst Quality Programs
Description:
Description:
PRIMARY FUNCTION
Ensures a high level of quality service for guests and business partners by owning the assigned quality processes and projects related to Quality Support applications. Create and maintain new capabilities, assist TI quality team and other partners in obtaining data relevant to applicable strategies, and work to ensure stable, reliable, consistent tools and data sources.
Responsible for the planning & execution of projects/workload by building, tuning, maintaining all interaction analytics categories within applicable tools.
Handle reporting, calibrations, data collection & other interactions with Target India & MPLS partners.
Own & Lead efforts to analyze data and provide recommendations to support TI Managers and Quality Support Specialists by listening to calls, analyzing transactions & other non-call data. By compiling information and reporting from quality tools, support the execution of targeted quality projects, contact center agent performance, contact center guest experience (Net promoter score), compliance discrepancies etc.…
Act as a subject matter expert for the related work stream, lead projects and other initiatives assigned as a POC, adhering to all POC responsibilities. Support other work streams as required.
Collaborates effectively within the Quality team (TI & MPLS) to clearly define objectives, requirements, timelines, analysis requirement and success measures of projects/initiatives of related work-stream.
Measure performance (Accuracy, Timelines, POC responsibilities etc.) through tracking feedback from auditors and partners as a POC on all assigned projects and call out challenges on a timely manner to ensure smooth experience for Partners and Auditors.
Train & share knowledge as required – create training plans, training documents, share feedback on trainee progress & manage their performance through the ramp period.
Interact with TI POC’s, QSS and TI Managers to identify, define and measure the impact of work/data capture completed by the auditors.
Maintain track record of performance, impact and feedback received for POC’s/responsible Level3’s on all projects/initiatives and call out trends to TI Managers.
Own, publish and present end to end of critical reviews & reports, dashboards of processes as applicable to the relevant stakeholders. Create & maintain documentation on the processes supported to iron out any discrepancies & have clear guidelines for future support.
Perform additional responsibilities as assigned
Work towards the Team deliverables in Target India. Contribute to the overall productivity and accuracy as per standards defined in the team
Drive the different initiatives in Target India with enthusiasm and in a fast, fun and friendly way.
Support project and department leaders to identify, analyze and evaluate business/Team issues.
Make recommendations for process improvement and participates in implementation of new initiatives.
Flexibility to work outside normal business hours as required
REPORTING/WORKING RELATIONSHIPS
Reports to: TI Sr. Manager
Working relationships with Quality Business Consultants and FRS business areas as need, including Business Systems, Global Operations, and contact center leader
JOB REQUIREMENTS
MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS:
3 years of relevant experience in contact center (listening to calls, managing reports etc.)
3 years Bachelor’s Degree
Excellent communication and organizational skills
Strong problem solving, critical thinking and decision making skills,
Data Mining, Ability to identify data trends
Strong Team player
Root cause Analysis and concepts of yellow belt, Lean
Project management skills & Presentation skills
Reporting and analytical skills
High MS office & VBA knowledge on Excel
DESIRED REQUIREMENTS
Speech analytics capabilities

Qualifications:

Title: Business Analyst
Description:
MoneyGram International now requires a Business Analyst in Mumbai to be the liaison among stakeholders in order to elicit, analyze, communicate, and validate requirements for changes to business processes, policies, and possibly information systems. As the Business Analyst you understand and analyze business processes and opportunities in the context of the requirements and recommend solutions that enable the organization to achieve its goals. The Business Analyst must clearly understand project change management and how the role plays a key piece in the change management process. You must also be able to fulfill basic project management responsibilities throughout the project lifecycle.
Primary Responsibilities

Independently initiates, identifies and coordinates the analysis of business needs in project areas.
Interfaces or liaison between business owners/users and development project teams to determine, communicate and validate business requirements.
Supports projects by understanding business needs, opportunities, problems, impacts, risks, and presents and agrees to recommended solutions.
Understands, gathers, and defines requirements of all types, and documents with process flows and diagrams.
Writes detailed business requirements, functional specifications and, when involved in project teams using an iterative development methodology.
Identifies and communicates requirement/scope issues.
Ties the strategic objectives to the project and quickly demonstrates a detailed understanding of the business, and be able to help determine solutions to problems.
Identifies opportunities for increasing business efficiency through improved manual and automated process systems.
Understands business processes and products for assigned business functions and the relationships between those processes and information systems, including the impact of system changes to business processes.
Determines the impact of system change to the business and vice versa.
Builds consensus among stakeholders, often recapping direction and decisions made.
Applies logic to conflict management and issues.
Maintains user confidence and protects operations by keeping information confidential.
Supports a variety of applications, sites, and departments.
Assists in facilitating User Acceptance Testing or derive test strategy in creating and reviewing test cases.
Communicates risks and ensures understanding of these risks.
Provides on-going project management and status reporting at all levels.
Creates and maintains project schedules by developing project plans and functional specifications, estimating time requirements, establishing deadlines, monitoring milestone completion, and tracking all phases of the project lifecycle.
Provides timely reporting of issues that impact project progress, coordinating actions, and resolving conflicts.
Conducts project meetings with project team(s) regularly to review project deliverables and deadlines.
Performs other duties as assigned.

Title: Associate Analyst
Description:
Job Title: Associate Analyst – IT (J2EE) #073799

If you desire to be part of something special, to be part of a winning team, to be part of a fun team - winning is fun.

We are looking forward to an Associate Analyst – IT (J2EE) in Eaton’s Enterprise IT, based in Pune, India.

In Eaton, making our work exciting, engaging, meaningful; ensuring safety, health, wellness; and being a model of inclusion & diversity are already embedded in who we are - it’s in our values, part of our vision, and our clearly defined aspirational goals.

This exciting role requires a understanding in a range of enterprise application and web server technologies, operating systems, as well as a desire to understand business objectives and system requirements. Candidate will work directly with project and IT teams to be involved in the design, implementation, and support of J2EE and Integration technologies.


Involved in the design, architecture, solutions development, and support of a highly available web infrastructure comprised of mainly Linux and some Windows systems using Red Hat JBoss, Oracle WebLogic, Apache Tomcat, Open Source web/application server technologies, and Oracle LDAP. This infrastructure is key to Eaton’s web presence, and houses critical company-wide applications including Enterprise Portals, Content Management, eCommerce Sites, Engineering Collaboration, Customer Information Systems, and Identity and Access Management solutions. Candidate will provide direct technical consulting and support for all requirements in the planning, coordination, development, and implementation of releases, upgrades, or changes to the infrastructure components as well as applications to run both internal/external to Eaton. This position is also responsible for interaction with data center, application development teams, and security teams.

Your essential responsibilities:

Accountable for maintaining high levels of solution performance, availability and capacity, demonstrating a commitment to quality
Design and provide solutions to fit the requirements of the project stakeholders, customers, and end users conforming to the standards established by the IT organization
Review and critique the solutions of others
Assess IT project activities to ensure compliance with established IT and industry standards


Specific Duties:

Application and Web Server installation, patching, upgrades, and performance tuning
Participate in the design and development standards for solutions platforms and peripheral applications
Participate in the development of proactive monitoring solutions for all solution elements
Incident analysis, documentation and resolution
Participate in capacity planning
End-user support and communication
Inter-team and intra-team communication
Commitment to knowledge sharing
Design solutions to fit the business requirements and estimate effort


Qualifications


If you are:

Bachelor’s degree in a technical discipline such as: B.E / BTech / MCA / Equivalent (EITC) or B.S. Comp Sci / Mathematics / Engineering / Equivalent
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
Excellent proficiency with the English language (written and verbal)
Basic understanding of application and web servers architecture and uses
Ability to understand, collaborate, and articulate J2EE team needs with both Eaton and Vendor development teams.
Some familiarity with JDBC, JMS, JMX, Web Services, SSL/TLS concepts
Familiar with code build process (Jenkins) and code vaults with tools like Ant, Maven, Git, SVN, Clearcase
Some Linux experience including shell and scripting for automating repetitive tasks
Basic ability to understand java logs for analysis
Desire to learn, test, and promote new application and web server versions


Yes! Because you are the one we are looking for, we hope to hear from you now!

We make what matters work.

Making what matters work at Eaton takes the passion of every employee around the world. We create an environment where creativity, invention and discovery become reality, each and every day.

It’s where bold, bright professionals like you can reach your full potential - and where you can help us reach ours. Need more about Eaton? Come on in @ www.eaton.com.
We make what matters work. Everywhere you look—from the technology and machinery that surrounds us, to the critical services and infrastructure that we depend on every day—you’ll find one thing in common. It all relies on power. That’s why Eaton is dedicated to improving people’s lives and the environment with power management technologies that are more reliable, efficient, safe and sustainable. Because this is what matters. We are confident we can deliver on this promise because of the attributes that our employees embody. We’re ethical, passionate, accountable, efficient, transparent and we’re committed to learning. These values enable us to tackle some of the toughest challenges on the planet, never losing sight of what matters.
Job: Information Technology
Region: Asia Pacific
Organization: Corporate Sector
Job Level: Entry Level
Schedule: Full-time
Is remote work (i.e. working from home or another Eaton facility) allowed for this position?: No
Does this position offer relocation?: No
Travel: No

Title: Sr Financial Analyst
Description:
What's the role?
This role is part of the global Finance and Control team. This team consists of subject matter experts in corporate finance, business finance, accounting and taxation. These professionals partner with HERE’s stakeholders with fact–driven insights that drive business performance. Crafting financial strategy, creating a foundation of business information and advising business on all matters finance forms the basis of day to day work.

As Sr Financial Analyst, you will become part of the global Finance and Control team and be based in Mumbai. You will be a key member of a newly established center of excellence overseeing deal-based information, providing timely validation, reporting and analysis to support the growth of the organization - both regionally and globally. This includes analysis of deal terms, validation of assumptions, analysis of historic information, trends and future projections, performance monitoring, providing internal and external reporting. In this role you will identify risks and opportunities and ensure consistent best-in-class quality of information and operational support.

You will partner with a fast paced and high performing finance team, to ensure we meet our short-term and long-term objectives. You will also interact on an ongoing basis with Sales, Legal, Accounting and other cross-functional departments located across the globe.
These are the key responsibilities and tasks that will help you succeed in this role:
Serve as a key member of the newly established center of excellence, be an important partner for the Customer organization, as well as key operational stakeholders to provide financial transparency and decision support
Serve as the liaison with respect to financial matters between Finance & Control, Sales, Accounting, Legal, Pricing & other teams
Develop a robust understanding of HERE, its products, its markets and its internal organization to form an objective perspective, detect trends and provide insightful analysis and communicate this effectively to senior management
Conduct the deal-level analysis and input across financial and other systems. Provide reports on current vs planned performance, including implications for targeting, forecasting and compensation across our Customer organization
Develop analyses, simulation models, new tools, reports and templates to support planning and decision making, drive efficiencies and enable the company’s ambitious growth plans
Provide specialist advice/input in complex and broad financial issues, e.g. bookings system, partner revenue, product P&L, operational expenses, deferred revenue, etc.
Who are you?
You will be the ideal candidate for this role if:
You have a bachelor’s degree in a relevant area (economics, finance, business administration or other)
You have 5+ years of relevant international experience
You have a strong analytical mindset with the capacity to draw out conclusions from large, complex data sets and bridge information across systems and formats
You have an excellent attention to the details
You are proficient in modeling skills including advanced Excel and PowerPoint skills
Preferably you have knowledge and experience with enterprise reporting and planning systems (Hyperion Planning, Workspace, Smart View, Peoplesoft and other)
You have excellent written and verbal communication skills with a customer focused, professional demeanor
You can work with business partners in a fast-paced business environment, deliver measurable results and build trust with leaders
Good communication skills along with expereince working with global teams
Who are we?
Ever checked in somewhere on social media? Ever tracked your online orders? You might be using HERE Technologies every single day without even realizing it. You can find us everywhere: in vehicles, smartphones, drones or third-party apps. We believe that with the right people, we will continue to be a game-changer in the technology industry and improve the daily lives of people around the world. Find out more by clicking the video below or going HERE.

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
Description:
About us:
Target is an iconic brand, a Fortune 50 company and one of America’s leading retailers.
Behind one of the world’s best loved brands is a uniquely capable and brilliant team of data scientists, engineers and analysts. The Target Data Science & Analytics team creates the tools and data products to sustainably educate and enable our business partners to make great data-based decisions. We help develop the technology that personalizes the guest experience, from product recommendations to relevant ad content. We’re also the source of the data and analytics behind Target’s Internet of Things (IOT) applications, fraud detection, Supply Chain optimization and demand forecasting. We play a key role in identifying the test-and-measure or A/B test opportunities that continuously help Target improve the guest experience, whether they love to shop in stores or at Target.com.
A role with Data Science and Analytics (DSA) means being a part of the team that works closely with the business and identifies problems / opportunities for improved decision-making through better data analysis. This covers the whole gamut from simple descriptive analysis to more complex predictive and prescriptive analytics, using advanced modeling and machine learning techniques primarily using open source technologies and big data platforms. The emphasis is on actionable insights, which is possible through a combination of technical skills and business understanding.
As Data Analyst, DSA you will work closely with business/product teams and understand their priorities/roadmap. Based on this understanding, you are expected to identify appropriate metrics that will drive the right decisions for the business, and then build reporting solutions to deliver these metrics at the required frequency in an optimal and reliable fashion. You will also answer ad-hoc questions from your business users by conducting quick analysis on relevant data, identify trends and correlations, and form hypotheses to explain the observations. Some of these will lead to bigger analytical projects of increasing complexity, where you will work initially as a part of a bigger team, but also work independently as you gain more experience. Finally, you are expected to always adhere to project schedule and technical rigor as well as requirements for documentation, code versioning, etc.
Core responsibilities are described within this job description. Job duties may change at any time due to business needs.
About You:
B.Tech / B.E. or equivalent experience
1+ years of relevant experience
“Hands-on” experience in analytics / data science
Understanding of foundational mathematics and statistics
Conceptual understanding of analytical techniques like Linear Regression, Logistic Regression, Time-series models, Classification Techniques, etc.
Basic SQL skills
Strong written and verbal communication skills to explain complex analytical methodologies to clients regardless of the clients technical expertise
Exposure to R, Python, Hive, or other open source languages preferable
Big data experience preferable

At Micro Focus, everything we do is based on a simple idea: The fastest way to get results is to build on what you have. Our software solutions enable organizations to do just that. Title: Business Analyst
Description:
MoneyGram International now requires a Business Analyst in Mumbai to be the liaison among stakeholders in order to elicit, analyze, communicate, and validate requirements for changes to business processes, policies, and possibly information systems. As the Business Analyst you understand and analyze business processes and opportunities in the context of the requirements and recommend solutions that enable the organization to achieve its goals. The Business Analyst must clearly understand project change management and how the role plays a key piece in the change management process. You must also be able to fulfill basic project management responsibilities throughout the project lifecycle.
Primary Responsibilities

Independently initiates, identifies and coordinates the analysis of business needs in project areas.
Interfaces or liaison between business owners/users and development project teams to determine, communicate and validate business requirements.
Supports projects by understanding business needs, opportunities, problems, impacts, risks, and presents and agrees to recommended solutions.
Understands, gathers, and defines requirements of all types, and documents with process flows and diagrams.
Writes detailed business requirements, functional specifications and, when involved in project teams using an iterative development methodology.
Identifies and communicates requirement/scope issues.
Ties the strategic objectives to the project and quickly demonstrates a detailed understanding of the business, and be able to help determine solutions to problems.
Identifies opportunities for increasing business efficiency through improved manual and automated process systems.
Understands business processes and products for assigned business functions and the relationships between those processes and information systems, including the impact of system changes to business processes.
Determines the impact of system change to the business and vice versa.
Builds consensus among stakeholders, often recapping direction and decisions made.
Applies logic to conflict management and issues.
Maintains user confidence and protects operations by keeping information confidential.
Supports a variety of applications, sites, and departments.
Assists in facilitating User Acceptance Testing or derive test strategy in creating and reviewing test cases.
Communicates risks and ensures understanding of these risks.
Provides on-going project management and status reporting at all levels.
Creates and maintains project schedules by developing project plans and functional specifications, estimating time requirements, establishing deadlines, monitoring milestone completion, and tracking all phases of the project lifecycle.
Provides timely reporting of issues that impact project progress, coordinating actions, and resolving conflicts.
Conducts project meetings with project team(s) regularly to review project deliverables and deadlines.
Performs other duties as assigned.

Title: Research Associate / Research Analyst (MBA 0-2 years)
Description:
RESEARCH ANALYST / RESEARCH ASSOCIATE
For Emerging Technologies in Automotive, Future Mobility, Digital Healthcare and Cleantech | BENGALURU, INDIA
This is a role for MBA Freshers. Max of 2 years experience is fine.
Ideapoke is a global, fast growing start-up with offices in Bengaluru, Bay Area, Tokyo and Shanghai. Our software, search and insights power the innovation agenda of the largest Fortune 500 and Global 2000 companies worldwide. These companies use Ideapoke's data and insights to build new products, develop new technologies, services and solutions to address emerging market needs.
Our growth is powered by our people and their unwavering commitment to the company-wide vision, strong work ethic and an entrepreneurial do-it-all spirit. We push the boundaries and break existing thought processes with the strong belief that innovation amplifies success in every piece of work we do and by extension, amplifying the success of our clients.
Ideapokes like to constantly learn, grow and make a difference. Join us and be part of our story.
What is the Research Analyst (RA) role?
The RA is a high impact individual contributor playing a transformative role in the client's technology, market & strategy areas. You will perform cutting-edge data driven secondary research to find, analyze and organize information for global client projects.
Responsibilities and Duties
What are my roles and responsibilities?
- Understand business implications of technology / product innovations and keep pace with technology developments, R&D focus areas, stakeholders, emerging business models
- Perform research on topics including but not limited to the next generation of Automotive, Transportation, Healthcare, Energy & Cleantech areas for some of the world's largest companies.
- You have a deep intellectual curiosity to understand how innovators such as startups, university researchers and large companies function and operate.
- You are ready to develop and utilize skillsets in data collection and insights generation from secondary and primary sources.
- Provide market analysis, competitive intelligence and identify technology opportunities across the innovation ecosystem for the client.
- Report writing: You are able to synthesize large volumes of data and present meaningful conclusions and insights in the form of market and technology reports
- Interact and learn from research leads and other colleagues to become a super research analyst.
Required Experience, Skills and Qualifications
What skills and experiences would I bring into this role?
- BE/BTech + MBA with 0 - 2 (max) years of experiences. We are looking for freshers as well.
- Ability to read and understand emerging technologies and technology developments.
- Flair for Creative Problem Solving; Logical Reasoning; Analytical Thinking;
- Exceptional written and oral communication abilities
- More importantly, you are a team player. You will work with your colleagues in a collaborative, extremely fast-paced startup environment.
Benefits
Why would I love this role?
- First and foremost you have a fascination for new technologies and their impact on the world.
- You are a young, dynamic individual who is hungry to perform in a challenging environment working on multiple projects and tasks
- You are ready to experiment, fail and learn fast in a startup environment.
- No two days in Ideapoke are the same. You are ready to work across these exciting technology themes here.
- You are looking for a dynamic career progression in a fast growing organisation (backed by leading investors from the valley) developing new products and services in an innovative space.
- You are ambitious: At Ideapoke you will be more than just a cog of an organisational machine, we encourage you to challenge the status quo and create your own opportunities.
Job Types: Full-time, Fresher
Education:
Master's (Required)
Location:
Bengaluru, Karnataka (Required)

Proficiency in English
Excellent analytical and critical thinking skills
Outstanding writing skills and ability to report on research findings clearly

Title: Sr Data Analyst
Description:
Description:
About this Opportunity
The Data Science & Analytics team designs and creates innovative solutions for a variety of applications, platforms and environments. Data Science & Analytics not only gives Target a competitive advantage in the marketplace, but also enhances the guest experience through the smart use of data in the retail industry
Our Senior Data Analyst researches data assets, applies various technologies to these assets and develops metrics, reports, and statistics. They are experts in sourcing data and providing the highest quality data for their business domain through the tools. Senior data analyst spend about 50% of their time advancing the development of metrics, reports and analysis into integrated dashboards. Through the deep understanding of their users and the data they consult on statistical analysis as well as contribute to measuring the key business outcomes as tests are applied. By translating that data into clear stories and insights data analysts help the business take action. They also play an active role with engineers and product owners ensuring the critical data is available and reliable in the proper platforms with clear SLAs. As a Sr Data Analyst, you'll take the lead in:
Actively exploring data and sourcing it from Teradata or Hadoop for specific analytical use cases. This includes researching data, perform joins on proper elements and create a final data asset to be consumed by analysts and users.
Joining and creating measurable insights from the data to be shared
Developing metrics, reports, and statistics
Documenting calculations, code, and adhering to data management principles
Validating and testing data assets of others in the form of peer review
Exploring statistical analysis using R or Python that could be applied to the data for providing insights
Performing descriptive statistics including mean, variance, median, correlation
Train and communicate output to users to gather feedback
Applies insights and testing in partnership with business users
Integrate tests and feedback on data assets to inform engineers on ways we can improve value of our data.
Perform analysis on business variables and identify tolerances/rates that are considered statistically significant.
Identifies data assets that can be integrated into dashboards and builds those based on user stories/personas
Requirements
BS degree or MS degree in Computer Science, Applied Mathematics, Physics, Statistics or area of study related to data sciences and data mining
Good working knowledge of SQL
Ability to work with technical and business-oriented teams
Worked on projects to build Big Data solutions using Hadoop and/or NoSQL technology
Ability to work with non-technical resources on the team to translate data needs into Big Data solutions using the appropriate tools
Understand application/software development and design in Agile methodology.
Collaborative personality, able to engage in interactive discussions with the rest of the team
Inquisitive on Big Data technology; current on new ideas and analytical tools like R, Python, Scala
Good understanding of the Hadoop ecosystem and low level constructs
Understanding of statistics
Benefits
Eligible team members will receive market competitive package including competitive pay, health, accidental and life insurance coverage, gratuity and provident fund, training and development and other perks and benefits. Target is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer and is a drug-free workplace.
About Target®
Expect the Best. At Target, we have a vision: to become the best - the best culture and brand, the best place for growth and the company with the best reputation. We offer an inclusive, collaborative and energetic work environment that rewards those who perform. We deliver engaging, innovative and on-trend experiences for our team members and our guests. We invest in our team members' futures by developing leaders and providing a breadth of opportunities for professional development. It takes the best to become the best, and we are committed to building a team that does the right thing for our guests, shareholders, team members and communities.
Minneapolis-based Target Corporation serves guests at stores nationwide and at Target.com. Target is committed to providing a fun and convenient shopping experience with access to unique and highly differentiated products at affordable prices. Since 1946, the corporation has given 5 percent of its income through community grants and programs like Take Charge of Education®.

Title: Senior Data Science Analyst, BI
Description:
Everyone communicates. It’s the essence of the human experience. How we communicate is evolving. Technology is reshaping the way we live, learn and thrive. The epicenter of this transformation is the network—our passion. Our experts are rethinking the purpose, role and usage of networks to help our customers increase bandwidth, expand capacity, enhance efficiency, speed deployment and simplify migration. From remote cell sites to massive sports arenas, from busy airports to state-of-the-art data centers— we provide the essential expertise and vital infrastructure your business needs to succeed. The world’s most advanced networks rely on CommScope connectivity.

Position Title: Senior Data Science Analyst, BI

Senior Data Science Analyst will be part of Business Analytics team and as a Senior Data Science Analyst, you will work and apply your knowledge and skills in designing, development & deployment of Cognitive advanced analytics statistical models, machine learning methods and solutions for internal and external global CommScope business users across various domains. Uses statistical and other tools/languages - R, Python, Java, Haddop,Scala,IOT, Visual Inspection deep learning algorithms and Azure IOT&ML to design and deliver end-to-end Advanced Analytics solutions.
Ensure Advanced solutions are scalable, reliable, and trust worthy for decision makers. Works as a subject matter expert in assigned functional areas. Based on business problems and user personas data scientist develop, conceptualize and test Various Statistical models and deliver strategic advanced analytics projects from design to execution

Duties & Responsibilities:
Design and develop actionable Advanced Analytical solutions that provide insights to decision makers
Profeciency in Data identification,prepration, data mining, integrating data from different sources structured and unstructured, and write machine learning and deep learning algorithms
Identifies what data is available and relevant, including internal and external data sources, leveraging new data collection processes such as IOT, Visual inspection or social media.
Analyze simulation results, Designs experiments, test hypotheses, and build models.
Leads discovery processes with stakeholders to identify the business problems, requirements, opportunities and the expected outcome.
Collaborates with Business users and Enggners and subject matter experts to select the relevant sources of information.Makes strategic recommendations on data collection, integration and retention requirements incorporating business requirements and knowledge of best practices.
Proficiency in developeing solutions using statistical and other tools/languages like R, Python, Java, Haddop,Scala,IOT, Visual Inspection deep learning algorithms and Azure IOT&ML
Develops innovative and effective approaches to solve analytics problems and communicates results and methodologies.
Analyze the solution impact on existing systems and process, and work with various teams to finalize the scope and depth of testing required for production deployment.
Deliver projects by authoring/reviewing solution design, functional design, technical design, and test sets and collaborate with global teams in delivery.
Analyze customer requests for feasibility, Develop project scope, schedule, and resource estimates, adhering to company software development methodology and standards. Prepare project status reports and present project status reports to project stake holders.
Proactively work with business users and source system analysts to understand and gain expertise in business process and data relationships.
Work with security team to secure the data. Work with the System, Database, and Application Administrators to ensure that application performs within the defined performance parameters.
Set up and Adhere to the organizational development process and standards.
Proactively recommend and implement enhancements and/or upgrades and ensure that architecture and technology standards are in place.

Related Education & Experience:
Bachelor’s in related curriculum such as Information Systems, Data Science and Statistis with w/ 5-8 Years experience in Advanced Analytics using Machine learning and Statistical modeling is preferable.

SKILLS REQUIRED:
Include demonstrated competencies and physical, mental, & interpersonal skills.
Ability to design complex systems and translate user requirements into business solutions.
Experience in interviewing business users, collecting and interpreting requirements, explaining the solution details to business audience and run business meetings.
Proven understanding of data mining, statistical analysis and predictive analysis concepts.
Build simulation models using different programing languages and vendor tools to model business problems in support of decision-making.
Work on tools and technologies such as R,Python,Vision inspection deep learning algorithms, SPAS, Java, Haddop,Scala and Azure ML and IOT
Hands on experience developing statistical and predictive models in the context of IOT based Manfacturing Operations,predictive maintenance, Visual inspection based Quality improvement and process optimisation, Sales and Marketing basket analysis with structured and unstructured data.
Ability to analyze simulation results, develop technical reports and presentations and guide business and technical leaders on suitable data analysis strategy.
Should be passionate about data science and technology, and stay abreast with industry trend and technology roadmap in the areas of Machine Learning, Big Data and Data Science.
A process- oriented, Continuous process improvement driven, with strong project management skills.
Must be able to effectively communicate and manage global development teams.

Title: Business Analyst
Description:
MoneyGram International now requires a Business Analyst in Mumbai to be the liaison among stakeholders in order to elicit, analyze, communicate, and validate requirements for changes to business processes, policies, and possibly information systems. As the Business Analyst you understand and analyze business processes and opportunities in the context of the requirements and recommend solutions that enable the organization to achieve its goals. The Business Analyst must clearly understand project change management and how the role plays a key piece in the change management process. You must also be able to fulfill basic project management responsibilities throughout the project lifecycle.
Primary Responsibilities

Independently initiates, identifies and coordinates the analysis of business needs in project areas.
Interfaces or liaison between business owners/users and development project teams to determine, communicate and validate business requirements.
Supports projects by understanding business needs, opportunities, problems, impacts, risks, and presents and agrees to recommended solutions.
Understands, gathers, and defines requirements of all types, and documents with process flows and diagrams.
Writes detailed business requirements, functional specifications and, when involved in project teams using an iterative development methodology.
Identifies and communicates requirement/scope issues.
Ties the strategic objectives to the project and quickly demonstrates a detailed understanding of the business, and be able to help determine solutions to problems.
Identifies opportunities for increasing business efficiency through improved manual and automated process systems.
Understands business processes and products for assigned business functions and the relationships between those processes and information systems, including the impact of system changes to business processes.
Determines the impact of system change to the business and vice versa.
Builds consensus among stakeholders, often recapping direction and decisions made.
Applies logic to conflict management and issues.
Maintains user confidence and protects operations by keeping information confidential.
Supports a variety of applications, sites, and departments.
Assists in facilitating User Acceptance Testing or derive test strategy in creating and reviewing test cases.
Communicates risks and ensures understanding of these risks.
Provides on-going project management and status reporting at all levels.
Creates and maintains project schedules by developing project plans and functional specifications, estimating time requirements, establishing deadlines, monitoring milestone completion, and tracking all phases of the project lifecycle.
Provides timely reporting of issues that impact project progress, coordinating actions, and resolving conflicts.
Conducts project meetings with project team(s) regularly to review project deliverables and deadlines.
Performs other duties as assigned.

Title: Analyst Quality Programs
Description:
Description:
PRIMARY FUNCTION
Ensures a high level of quality service for guests and business partners by owning the assigned quality processes and projects related to Quality Support applications. Create and maintain new capabilities, assist TI quality team and other partners in obtaining data relevant to applicable strategies, and work to ensure stable, reliable, consistent tools and data sources.
PRINCIPAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES
Responsible for the planning & execution of projects/workload by building, tuning, maintaining all interaction analytics categories within applicable tools.
Handle reporting, calibrations, data collection & other interactions with Target India & MPLS partners.
Own & Lead efforts to analyze data and provide recommendations to support TI Managers and Quality Support Specialists by listening to calls, analyzing transactions & other non-call data. By compiling information and reporting from quality tools, support the execution of targeted quality projects, contact center agent performance, contact center guest experience (Net promoter score), compliance discrepancies etc.…
Act as a subject matter expert for the related work stream, lead projects and other initiatives assigned as a POC, adhering to all POC responsibilities. Support other work streams as required.
Collaborates effectively within the Quality team (TI & MPLS) to clearly define objectives, requirements, timelines, analysis requirement and success measures of projects/initiatives of related work-stream.
Measure performance (Accuracy, Timelines, POC responsibilities etc.) through tracking feedback from auditors and partners as a POC on all assigned projects and call out challenges on a timely manner to ensure smooth experience for Partners and Auditors.
Train & share knowledge as required – create training plans, training documents, share feedback on trainee progress & manage their performance through the ramp period.
Interact with TI POC’s, QSS and TI Managers to identify, define and measure the impact of work/data capture completed by the auditors.
Maintain track record of performance, impact and feedback received for POC’s/responsible Level3’s on all projects/initiatives and call out trends to TI Managers.
Own, publish and present end to end of critical reviews & reports, dashboards of processes as applicable to the relevant stakeholders. Create & maintain documentation on the processes supported to iron out any discrepancies & have clear guidelines for future support.
Perform additional responsibilities as assigned
Work towards the Team deliverables in Target India. Contribute to the overall productivity and accuracy as per standards defined in the team
Drive the different initiatives in Target India with enthusiasm and in a fast, fun and friendly way.
Support project and department leaders to identify, analyze and evaluate business/Team issues.
Make recommendations for process improvement and participates in implementation of new initiatives.
Flexibility to work outside normal business hours as required
REPORTING/WORKING RELATIONSHIPS
Reports to: TI Sr. Manager
Working relationships with Quality Business Consultants and FRS business areas as need, including Business Systems, Global Operations, and contact center leader
JOB REQUIREMENTS
MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS:
3 years of relevant experience in contact center (listening to calls, managing reports etc.)
3 years Bachelor’s Degree
Excellent communication and organizational skills
Strong problem solving, critical thinking and decision making skills,
Data Mining, Ability to identify data trends
Strong Team player
Root cause Analysis and concepts of yellow belt, Lean
Project management skills & Presentation skills
Reporting and analytical skills
High MS office & VBA knowledge on Excel
DESIRED REQUIREMENTS
Speech analytics capabilities

Qualifications:

Title: Tech Central - SAP Analyst
Description:
JoinPitney Bowes as Senior SAP SD Functional Analyst
Years of Experience required- 10+years
Job Location-Pune

Impact
As a Senior SAP SD Functional Analyst, youwill be part of the SAP Order to Cash team that designs and develops solution forPitney Bowes customer base. You are expected to perform and participate in allaspects of SAP SD deliveries. Develop, implement, maintain and support thebusiness application architecture from a global perspective. If this type ofposition motivates you, tell us why you are the right person for thischallenging role!
The Job
Develop,implement, maintain and support the business application architecture from aglobal perspective
Act as aproactive partner to the business stakeholders, identifying and consulting inIT and process innovations
Implementstrategic business application projects using a global templates and processes
Use globalstandards to achieve simplicity, efficiency and effectiveness
Comfortablewith working in a customized and global SAP environment
Managingsupport issues within a Global Service Delivery Organization
Supportand maintenance with focus on SAP SD (Contracts & Sales Orders, Billing)
Integratewith other business applications like Sterling CPQ, Oracle Leasing & SFDC
Performand participate in all aspects of software development. This includes featureand functional development, writing unit and integration test cases, bug fixing,integration and deployment.
Should beresults oriented, proactive and ready to take ownership of their work
Writingdetailed functional specifications, working closely with technical teams onbuild and test
The Team

Our passionate and ambitious team deliversinnovations that help clients navigate the complex and always evolving world ofcommerce: from helping, them use data to market to the best customers, toenabling the sending of parcels and packages efficiently, to securing paymentsthrough statements and invoices.
Our global Innovation team is dedicated to usingthe best-in-class tools, processes and modern architectures to create greatexperiences for our clients. In a rapidly changing world, we have a clear technicalvision for our future that includes SaaS, APIs, Big Data, Advanced Analytics,Mobile and the Internet of Things. We are also focused on creating great clientexperiences, utilizing a Design Thinking platform and approach.

Helping clients achieve their greatest commercepotential are Pitney Bowes' 14,000+ passionate employees around the world, ourrelentless pursuit of innovation with over 2,300 active patents, and our focuson clients, who are at the center of all that we do - from small businesses to90% of the Fortune 500.

In everything, we do, we deliver accuracy andprecision to drive meaningful impact.
Pitney Bowes is an Equal EmploymentOpportunity/Affirmative Action Employer that values diversity and inclusivenessin the workplace.

Title: Senior QA/IT Analyst
Description:
The primary responsibility of the Sr. QA / IT Analyst is to assist in the management of areas of Quality Assurance (QA) and Information Technology (IT) related to Imaging Endpoints (IE) Core Lab Quality Management System (QMS). The Sr. QA / IT Analyst will be solutions-oriented, facilitate timely quality decisions, and meet the needs of the business and all stakeholders with respect to quality assurance principles and practices.
RESPONSIBILITIES
Provide quality system management within the regulations of investigational products and quality standards, specifically, 21 CFR part 312, 21 CFR part 211, 21 CFR part 11, and ISO 9001 and ISO 13485.
Provide direct QA support related to the IE QMS and IT infrastructures.
Develop, revise, implement, and maintain IE’s IT related validation documentation (IQs, OQs, PQs) to ensure system hardware and software are in compliance with all relevant regulations.
Develop and implement validation/qualification protocols for clinical imaging data management tools and electronic systems.
Responsible for the quality of documentation approved to support GXP activities for Imaging Endpoints and sponsor-related projects.
Establish and implement QA procedures and controls to develop a compliant Core Lab QMS and IT infrastructure.
Review and approve GXP documentation to ensure that guidelines are met.
Interface with the Compliance and Regulatory Affairs to implement quality system strategies and plans to facilitate continuous improvement of the regulated electronic systems
Aid in the generation of responses to inspectional findings and audits as applicable
Interface with other areas of the organization to provide sound QA decision-making in areas that impact the IT infrastructure and electronic systems.
Interact with third parties in matters pertaining to information technology, regulatory, quality, and compliance issues.
Facilitate good conduct of inspections and audits by communicating effectively, effectively preparing documentation, training staff, and providing accurate information.
Perform other duties as assigned by supervisor.
EDUCATION AND EXPERIENCE
Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology
Minimum of five (5) years of experience in regulated industries with at least two (2) years in pharmaceuticals or medical devices
Imaging Core Lab experience desired
Familiarity with medical imaging applications and DICOM network is preferred
Knowledge of Windows server as well as with VMWare, Citrix, Active Directory, LAN and desktop operating systems (Windows XP, Windows 7, OS X) is a plus
Electronic document management experience in a regulated environment a plus
Knowledge of 21 CFR 11, 21 CFR 312, ISO 13485, and FDA current thinking and interpretation of regulations and guidelines
Validation knowledge and experience in the review and approval of hardware and software validation reports
Knowledge of Good Manufacturing Practices regulations
Experience in preparation and/or review of documents submitted to FDA for review
QMS experience required
Quality risk management experience required
Proficiency in MS Office and internet applications required
SKILLS
Work precisely and in compliance with all procedures, rules, and regulations
Must maintain strict confidentiality of sensitive data, records, files, conversations, etc.
Excellent interpersonal, organizational, and communication skills, including oral and written
Self-motivated and able to grasp new concepts and learn quickly as well as motivate others
Ability to manage projects and deliverables with a high level of accuracy and completeness
Excellent hands-on computer skills with thorough knowledge of Microsoft Office to include Excel and Power Point (statistics, graphing, presentations, etc.)
Imaging Endpoints is an equal opportunity employer. All applicants will be considered for employment without attention to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, veteran or disability status
Job Types: Full-time, Contract
Experience:
work: 5 years (Preferred)
Education:
Bachelor's (Preferred)

Title: Sr Financial Analyst
Description:
What's the role?
This role is part of the global Finance and Control team. This team consists of subject matter experts in corporate finance, business finance, accounting and taxation. These professionals partner with HERE’s stakeholders with fact–driven insights that drive business performance. Crafting financial strategy, creating a foundation of business information and advising business on all matters finance forms the basis of day to day work.

As Sr Financial Analyst, you will become part of the global Finance and Control team and be based in Mumbai. You will be a key member of a newly established center of excellence overseeing deal-based information, providing timely validation, reporting and analysis to support the growth of the organization - both regionally and globally. This includes analysis of deal terms, validation of assumptions, analysis of historic information, trends and future projections, performance monitoring, providing internal and external reporting. In this role you will identify risks and opportunities and ensure consistent best-in-class quality of information and operational support.

You will partner with a fast paced and high performing finance team, to ensure we meet our short-term and long-term objectives. You will also interact on an ongoing basis with Sales, Legal, Accounting and other cross-functional departments located across the globe.
These are the key responsibilities and tasks that will help you succeed in this role:
Serve as a key member of the newly established center of excellence, be an important partner for the Customer organization, as well as key operational stakeholders to provide financial transparency and decision support
Serve as the liaison with respect to financial matters between Finance & Control, Sales, Accounting, Legal, Pricing & other teams
Develop a robust understanding of HERE, its products, its markets and its internal organization to form an objective perspective, detect trends and provide insightful analysis and communicate this effectively to senior management
Conduct the deal-level analysis and input across financial and other systems. Provide reports on current vs planned performance, including implications for targeting, forecasting and compensation across our Customer organization
Develop analyses, simulation models, new tools, reports and templates to support planning and decision making, drive efficiencies and enable the company’s ambitious growth plans
Provide specialist advice/input in complex and broad financial issues, e.g. bookings system, partner revenue, product P&L, operational expenses, deferred revenue, etc.
Who are you?
You will be the ideal candidate for this role if:
You have a bachelor’s degree in a relevant area (economics, finance, business administration or other)
You have 5+ years of relevant international experience
You have a strong analytical mindset with the capacity to draw out conclusions from large, complex data sets and bridge information across systems and formats
You have an excellent attention to the details
You are proficient in modeling skills including advanced Excel and PowerPoint skills
Preferably you have knowledge and experience with enterprise reporting and planning systems (Hyperion Planning, Workspace, Smart View, Peoplesoft and other)
You have excellent written and verbal communication skills with a customer focused, professional demeanor
You can work with business partners in a fast-paced business environment, deliver measurable results and build trust with leaders
Good communication skills along with expereince working with global teams
Who are we?
Ever checked in somewhere on social media? Ever tracked your online orders? You might be using HERE Technologies every single day without even realizing it. You can find us everywhere: in vehicles, smartphones, drones or third-party apps. We believe that with the right people, we will continue to be a game-changer in the technology industry and improve the daily lives of people around the world. Find out more by clicking the video below or going HERE.

Title: Market Analyst
Description:
Job Summary
We are looking for an experienced Market Research Analyst to join our Team,
to survey customer preferences and statistical data in order to support customers during their decision-making process regarding product designs, prices and promotions. He/She, should be able to analyze autonomously qualitative data, trends, strategies and competition aiming at increasing competitiveness.
**
Responsibilities and Duties
Collecting data on consumers, competitors, marketplace and consolidating information into actionable items, reports and presentations
Understanding business objectives and designing surveys to discover prospective customers’ preferences
Compiling and analyzing statistical data using modern and traditional methods to collect it
Communicating with clients to understand and document the business objectives
Designing or assisting in the development of questionnaires and moderator guides to ensure the necessary data is captured
Authoring reports containing actionable recommendations
Collecting data and assimilating statistics, using statistical software
Collating information and interpreting data for clients
Developing strategies to improve market reach.
Understand business objectives and design surveys to discover prospective customers’ preferences
Perform valid and reliable market research SWOT analysis
Provide competitive analysis on various companies’ market offerings, identify market trends, pricing/business models, sales and methods of operation
Remain fully informed on market trends, other parties researches and implement best practices
Required Experience, Skills and Qualifications
Ability to cope with fast-paced and pressured work
Accuracy, strong attention to detail and an analytical mind.
Ability to notice patterns within statistics
Familiarity or training in statistics and willingness to learn
Have strong IT skills and have knowledge of or be keen to learn statistical software packages
Monitoring customer bases and identifying new ones.
Exceptional written, oral, and presentation communication abilities
Bachelors or advanced degree in business, mathematics, or the sciences
Proven market research analysis experience
Ability to interpret large amounts of data and to multi-task
Search engines, web analytics and business research tools acumen
Working knowledge of data warehousing, modelling and mining

Experience:
work: 1 year (Preferred)
Education:
Bachelor's (Preferred)

Title: Data Validation Analyst
Description:
AppZen delivers the world’s leading AI platform for modern finance teams. Starting with business spend, we automate manual process, uncover problems, and optimize decision making for enterprises around the globe, including one-fourth of the Fortune 500. Our platform combines patented deep learning, computer vision, and semantic analysis with intelligence from thousands of online data sources to understand financial transactions in business context and make decisions before those transactions happen. AppZen is a must have for CFOs and their teams to reduce spend, achieve compliance, and streamline process.

We’ve taken off this year! Since we released our platform in 2016, nearly 1,000 enterprises have standardized on AppZen, including three of the top ten banks, four of the top ten media companies, three of the top ten pharmaceutical manufacturers, two of the top five aerospace companies, and five of the top ten software providers. We were a Gartner Cool Vendor last year, have been recognized as one of the fastest-growing technology companies in the market, and we just announced $35million in Series B funding.

Passionate about data and want to ensure the best customer experience?
We are looking for people who can ensure success with our fast growing list of Fortune 50 customers.
This position’s primary focus is analyzing customers data and working with our Implementation, Customer Success and Engineering teams to ensure customers are configured for success. If you are looking to make an immediate impact this is the role for you!
About You:
You love crunching numbers and looking for key trends to drive business value
You want to help our customers get the most out of AppZen’s audit solution and get joy out of watching a customer really succeed
You have GREAT communication skills and know how to get the message across
You have a finely tuned sense of urgency, you know when you can fix something, and when and how to ask for help
Responsibilities:
Analyzing customers data to identify areas of improvement within their configuration
Presenting data insights and potential solutions to teams within the Customer Success org
Working cross functionally to Identify and provide solutions to internal business process issues that impact the customer experience
Communicate suggested product improvements to the development team
Must-Have:
Humble and Friendly personality with an open and honest communication style
Exceptional written and verbal communication skills
Ability to understand our business applications quickly with little hands on training
Bonus Points: Working understanding of fraud and compliance

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
Job Summary

Strong analytical skills providing insights as well as recommendations for changes convincing decision makers of business benefits of the proposed solutions.
Flair for quantitative data analyses and interpretation and ability to process data to draw insights, answering “so what” questions about data.
High degree of proactiveness in analysing customer behaviour using available data to influence changes on the website. Excellent written and verbal communication skills with specific focus on “persuasive, influencing” communication style. Behavioural Attributes

Strong interpersonal skills to help collaborate across teams.
Logical thinking and ability to sift through data to identify insights attention to detail.
Responsibilities and Duties

Analytical Skills: Data analysts work with large amounts of data: facts, figures, and number crunching. You will need to see through the data and analyze it to find conclusions.
Communication Skills: Data analysts are often called to present their findings, or translate the data into an understandable document. You will need to write and speak clearly, easily communicating complex ideas.
Critical Thinking: Data analysts must look at the numbers, trends, and data and come to new conclusions based on the findings.
Attention to Detail: Data is precise. Data analysts have to make sure they are vigilant in their analysis to come to correct conclusions.
Math Skills: Data analysts need math skills to estimate numerical data.
Tools: Tableau, PoweBI or any similar
Required Experience, Skills and Qualifications

Any graduation with 2 year of exp

Benefits
As per company norms

Job Type: Full-time

Salary: ₹2,50,000 to ₹4,50,000 /year

Title: Analyst Quality Programs
Description:
Description:
PRIMARY FUNCTION
Ensures a high level of quality service for guests and business partners by owning the assigned quality processes and projects related to Quality Support applications. Create and maintain new capabilities, assist TI quality team and other partners in obtaining data relevant to applicable strategies, and work to ensure stable, reliable, consistent tools and data sources.
PRINCIPAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES
Responsible for the planning & execution of projects/workload by building, tuning, maintaining all interaction analytics categories within applicable tools.
Handle reporting, calibrations, data collection & other interactions with Target India & MPLS partners.
Own & Lead efforts to analyze data and provide recommendations to support TI Managers and Quality Support Specialists by listening to calls, analyzing transactions & other non-call data. By compiling information and reporting from quality tools, support the execution of targeted quality projects, contact center agent performance, contact center guest experience (Net promoter score), compliance discrepancies etc.…
Act as a subject matter expert for the related work stream, lead projects and other initiatives assigned as a POC, adhering to all POC responsibilities. Support other work streams as required.
Collaborates effectively within the Quality team (TI & MPLS) to clearly define objectives, requirements, timelines, analysis requirement and success measures of projects/initiatives of related work-stream.
Measure performance (Accuracy, Timelines, POC responsibilities etc.) through tracking feedback from auditors and partners as a POC on all assigned projects and call out challenges on a timely manner to ensure smooth experience for Partners and Auditors.
Train & share knowledge as required – create training plans, training documents, share feedback on trainee progress & manage their performance through the ramp period.
Interact with TI POC’s, QSS and TI Managers to identify, define and measure the impact of work/data capture completed by the auditors.
Maintain track record of performance, impact and feedback received for POC’s/responsible Level3’s on all projects/initiatives and call out trends to TI Managers.
Own, publish and present end to end of critical reviews & reports, dashboards of processes as applicable to the relevant stakeholders. Create & maintain documentation on the processes supported to iron out any discrepancies & have clear guidelines for future support.
Perform additional responsibilities as assigned
Work towards the Team deliverables in Target India. Contribute to the overall productivity and accuracy as per standards defined in the team
Drive the different initiatives in Target India with enthusiasm and in a fast, fun and friendly way.
Support project and department leaders to identify, analyze and evaluate business/Team issues.
Make recommendations for process improvement and participates in implementation of new initiatives.
Flexibility to work outside normal business hours as required
REPORTING/WORKING RELATIONSHIPS
Reports to: TI Sr. Manager
Working relationships with Quality Business Consultants and FRS business areas as need, including Business Systems, Global Operations, and contact center leader
JOB REQUIREMENTS
MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS:
3 years of relevant experience in contact center (listening to calls, managing reports etc.)
3 years Bachelor’s Degree
Excellent communication and organizational skills
Strong problem solving, critical thinking and decision making skills,
Data Mining, Ability to identify data trends
Strong Team player
Root cause Analysis and concepts of yellow belt, Lean
Project management skills & Presentation skills
Reporting and analytical skills
High MS office & VBA knowledge on Excel
DESIRED REQUIREMENTS
Speech analytics capabilities

Qualifications:

Title: Senior Data Science Analyst, BI
Description:
Everyone communicates. It’s the essence of the human experience. How we communicate is evolving. Technology is reshaping the way we live, learn and thrive. The epicenter of this transformation is the network—our passion. Our experts are rethinking the purpose, role and usage of networks to help our customers increase bandwidth, expand capacity, enhance efficiency, speed deployment and simplify migration. From remote cell sites to massive sports arenas, from busy airports to state-of-the-art data centers— we provide the essential expertise and vital infrastructure your business needs to succeed. The world’s most advanced networks rely on CommScope connectivity.

Position Title: Senior Data Science Analyst, BI

General Summary:
Senior Data Science Analyst will be part of Business Analytics team and as a Senior Data Science Analyst, you will work and apply your knowledge and skills in designing, development & deployment of Cognitive advanced analytics statistical models, machine learning methods and solutions for internal and external global CommScope business users across various domains. Uses statistical and other tools/languages - R, Python, Java, Haddop,Scala,IOT, Visual Inspection deep learning algorithms and Azure IOT&ML to design and deliver end-to-end Advanced Analytics solutions.
Ensure Advanced solutions are scalable, reliable, and trust worthy for decision makers. Works as a subject matter expert in assigned functional areas. Based on business problems and user personas data scientist develop, conceptualize and test Various Statistical models and deliver strategic advanced analytics projects from design to execution

Duties & Responsibilities:
Design and develop actionable Advanced Analytical solutions that provide insights to decision makers
Profeciency in Data identification,prepration, data mining, integrating data from different sources structured and unstructured, and write machine learning and deep learning algorithms
Identifies what data is available and relevant, including internal and external data sources, leveraging new data collection processes such as IOT, Visual inspection or social media.
Analyze simulation results, Designs experiments, test hypotheses, and build models.
Leads discovery processes with stakeholders to identify the business problems, requirements, opportunities and the expected outcome.
Collaborates with Business users and Enggners and subject matter experts to select the relevant sources of information.Makes strategic recommendations on data collection, integration and retention requirements incorporating business requirements and knowledge of best practices.
Proficiency in developeing solutions using statistical and other tools/languages like R, Python, Java, Haddop,Scala,IOT, Visual Inspection deep learning algorithms and Azure IOT&ML
Develops innovative and effective approaches to solve analytics problems and communicates results and methodologies.
Analyze the solution impact on existing systems and process, and work with various teams to finalize the scope and depth of testing required for production deployment.
Deliver projects by authoring/reviewing solution design, functional design, technical design, and test sets and collaborate with global teams in delivery.
Analyze customer requests for feasibility, Develop project scope, schedule, and resource estimates, adhering to company software development methodology and standards. Prepare project status reports and present project status reports to project stake holders.
Proactively work with business users and source system analysts to understand and gain expertise in business process and data relationships.
Work with security team to secure the data. Work with the System, Database, and Application Administrators to ensure that application performs within the defined performance parameters.
Set up and Adhere to the organizational development process and standards.
Proactively recommend and implement enhancements and/or upgrades and ensure that architecture and technology standards are in place.

Related Education & Experience:
Bachelor’s in related curriculum such as Information Systems, Data Science and Statistis with w/ 5-8 Years experience in Advanced Analytics using Machine learning and Statistical modeling is preferable.

SKILLS REQUIRED:
Include demonstrated competencies and physical, mental, & interpersonal skills.
Ability to design complex systems and translate user requirements into business solutions.
Experience in interviewing business users, collecting and interpreting requirements, explaining the solution details to business audience and run business meetings.
Proven understanding of data mining, statistical analysis and predictive analysis concepts.
Build simulation models using different programing languages and vendor tools to model business problems in support of decision-making.
Work on tools and technologies such as R,Python,Vision inspection deep learning algorithms, SPAS, Java, Haddop,Scala and Azure ML and IOT
Hands on experience developing statistical and predictive models in the context of IOT based Manfacturing Operations,predictive maintenance, Visual inspection based Quality improvement and process optimisation, Sales and Marketing basket analysis with structured and unstructured data.
Ability to analyze simulation results, develop technical reports and presentations and guide business and technical leaders on suitable data analysis strategy.
Should be passionate about data science and technology, and stay abreast with industry trend and technology roadmap in the areas of Machine Learning, Big Data and Data Science.
A process- oriented, Continuous process improvement driven, with strong project management skills.
Must be able to effectively communicate and manage global development teams.

Title: NEWGISTICS | Technical Architect
Description:
Join Pitney Bowes as Technical Architect
Years of Experience required- 10+ years
Job Location-Pune

Impact
AsSr. Data Stream Developer who enjoys building innovative new user experiences forbusiness and operations users that are intuitive and high performing. The personwill have deep knowledge of designing, developing and supporting existing/newsystems and applications and will be part of the transformation from a traditionalETL to a Data Streaming Platform. The position is responsible for theintegration of enterprise data by developing, testing and implementing ETLprocesses/applications.
Thisperson will work with a highly-integrated, cross-discipline agile team and willbe responsible for building and supporting modern ETL services for crosssystems, applications and Business Intelligence.
Youare expected to be hands on and up to date with the latest technology stack. Ifthis type of position motivates you, tell us why you are the right person forthis challenging role!
The Job

Title: Data Lineage Tooling Analyst
Description:
Your role
Do you enjoy partnering with IT to build tooling solutions that support the business process?
Are you a quick learner who can understand process problems and identify sustainable and elegant solutions?
Are you passionate about building tools that allow organizations to manage their data?

We’re looking for a Data Lineage Tooling Analyst to:
ensure the smooth and risk free delivery of IT implementation and change activities
understand business requirements from multiple stakeholders and identify solutions
produce high quality business requirement documents and user stories detailing application changes requested by the stakeholders
coordinate with business users and IT teams to resolve any queries relating to tooling requirements
provide input in overall IT application delivery plans and manage business activities, such as UAT and BRT
write clear and good quality UAT scripts and work with business users to complete the necessary testing
Your team
You will be working in Group Operations within the Data Management Office (DMO). This role sits within the Data Lineage team, which operates out of Weehawken, London, Pune and Bangalore. The Data Lineage team is responsible for working directly with divisional subject matter experts, in both the business and IT, to map data flows in the organization and populate and maintain the group data dictionary. The DMO is responsible for embedding a data management culture into the organization by advocating for our strategy and proactively challenging the way the firm works with data. The DMO is made up of approximately 100 people, comprising UBS permanent staff, contractors and consultants.
Your expertise
ideally 8-12 years of experience in supporting application change in large, financial services organizations
excellent written and verbal communication skills
strong organizational skills and experience managing priorities in a structured and organized was that ensure high quality delivery on a timely basis
strong analytical skills and attention to detail
highly driven and motivated with a can–do attitude and with a desire to drive change in the organization
Your colleagues
About us
Expert advice. Wealth management. Investment banking. Asset management. Retail banking in Switzerland. And all the support functions. That's what we do. And we do it for private and institutional clients as well as corporations around the world.

We are about 60,000 employees in all major financial centers, in more than 50 countries. Do you want to be one of us?
Join us
We're a truly global, collaborative and friendly group of people. Having a diverse, inclusive and respectful workplace is important to us. And we support your career development, internal mobility and work-life balance. If this sounds interesting, apply now.
Disclaimer / Policy Statements
UBS is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We respect and seek to empower each individual and support the diverse cultures, perspectives, skills and experiences within our workforce.
